pages.md:
# MOVIE SETTING (Movie Recording)

Adjust movie-recording options.

To display options for movie recording, press **MENU/OK** in the movie shooting display and select the !Movie Setting Icon (MOVIE SETTING) tab.

!Movie Setting Menu

## MOVIE SETTING LIST

View current movie recording settings.

> ðŸ’¡ **Note:**  
> These options can also be viewed by pressing the **DISP/BACK** button while the movie quick menu is displayed.

## SHOOTING MODE

Choose a shooting mode for movies.

| Options               |
|-----------------------|
| PROGRAM AE            |
| SHUTTER PRIORITY AE   |
| APERTURE PRIORITY AE  |
| MANUAL                |
